Groundbreaking of Sullivan County Broadband Project

Groundbreaking of Sullivan County Broadband Project

June 12, 2025

Governor Hochul announced the groundbreaking of a $29.9 million broadband infrastructure project in Sullivan County that will bring high-speed internet access to more than 22,000 homes and businesses across the region's rural and mountainous terrain.

Gov. Hochul to Participate in Hearing on Immigration Policy

Gov. Hochul to Participate in Hearing on Immigration Policy

June 12, 2025

Governor Hochul is voluntarily appearing before the United States House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform to participate in a hearing on immigration policy.
